net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event

类 FMLInterModComms

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.event.FMLInterModComms

  • public class FMLInterModComms
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple intermod communications to receive simple messages directed at you from other mods

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  FMLInterModComms.IMCEvent
      Subscribe to this event to receive your messages (they are sent between FMLInitializationEvent and FMLPostInitializationEvent)
      static class  FMLInterModComms.IMCMessage
      You will receive an instance of this for each message sent

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • sendMessage

        public static boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String modId,
                                  java.lang.String key,
                                  NBTTagCompound value)
        Send a startup time message
        参数:
        modId - The modid to send it to
        key - The mod specific key
        value - An NBT type value
        返回:
        if the message was enqueued successfully and will be processed during startup

      • sendMessage

        public static boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String modId,
                                  java.lang.String key,
                                  java.lang.String value)
        Send a startup time message
        参数:
        modId - The modid to send it to
        key - The mod specific key
        value - A String value
        返回:
        if the message was enqueued successfully and will be processed during startup

      • sendFunctionMessage

        public static boolean sendFunctionMessage(java.lang.String modId,
                                          java.lang.String key,
                                          java.lang.String functionClassName)
        Send a startup time function message
        参数:
        modId - The modid to send it to
        key - The mod specific key
        functionClassName - The class name of a function that will be instantiated when the message is read. It must implement Function
        返回:
        if the message was enqueued successfully and will be processed during startup

      • sendRuntimeMessage

        public static void sendRuntimeMessage(java.lang.Object sourceMod,
                                      java.lang.String modId,
                                      java.lang.String key,
                                      NBTTagCompound value)
        Send a post-startup message
        参数:
        sourceMod - The mod sending the message
        modId - The modid to send it to
        key - The mod specific key
        value - An NBT type value

      • sendRuntimeFunctionMessage

        public static void sendRuntimeFunctionMessage(java.lang.Object sourceMod,
                                              java.lang.String modId,
                                              java.lang.String key,
                                              java.lang.String functionClassName)
        Send a post-startup function message.
        参数:
        sourceMod - The mod originating this message
        modId - The modid to send it to
        key - The mod specific key
        functionClassName - The name of a class to be loaded when the caller processes this message. The named class must extend Function

      • fetchRuntimeMessages

        public static com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<FMLInterModComms.IMCMessage> fetchRuntimeMessages(java.lang.Object forMod)
        Retrieve any pending runtime messages for the mod
        参数:
        forMod - The Mod.Instance of the Mod to fetch messages for
        返回:
        any messages - the collection will never be null
